meta-tags: name='description' content='Click on the board viewer to explore the MinnowBoard Turbot, a compact and affordable open source hardware platform that puts the power of a 64-bit Intel® Atom™ E38xx Series SoC in a small but versatile form factor.'
property='og:title' content='MinnowBoard.org | Explore MinnowBoard Turbot'

name='description' content='Find where to buy your board and its accessories from this page. The MinnowBoard Turbot, manufactured by ADI, is available from Mouser Electronics, Arrow, Amazon, and Netgate.'
property='og:title' content='MinnowBoard.org | Buy a MinnowBoard Turbot and Accessories'
name='description' content='Visit our GitHub project for active MinnowBoard hardware discussions, bugs and issues.'
property='og:title' content='MinnowBoard.org | MinnowBoard Turbot Community Resources'

name='description' content='Get the tutorials to start developing IoT projects including powering up the board, installing Windows IOT core, Wind River Pulsar Linux, and Ubuntu, and blinking Turbot D2 LED.'
property='og:title' content='MinnowBoard.org Tutorials | Develop MinnowBoard Turbot Projects'

name='description' content='Get support, ask questions, and troubleshoot common issues with MinnowBoard hardware using FAQ, our GitHub project bugs-and-help, community forums, or join our mailing list.'
property='og:title' content='MinnowBoard.org Help | Get Support for MinnowBoard Hardware'

name='description' content='MinnowBoard.org Foundation is an Oregon-based non-profit providing education and promotion of the design and use of open-source software and hardware in embedded computing.'
property='og:title' content='About the MinnowBoard.org Foundation'
name='description' content='View the technical specifications and design files of the MinnowBoard Turbot and find details on its compatibility with MinnowBoard MAX and breakout boards (Lures).'
property='og:title' content='MinnowBoard.org | MinnowBoard Turbot Technical Specifications'

name='description' content='Use the MinnowBoard Turbot - a high-performance, open source hardware platform - to launch your IoT project. It packs quad-core, compute intensive performance into a small form factor.'

name='og:description' content='Use the MinnowBoard Turbot - a high-performance, open source hardware platform - to launch your IoT project. It packs quad-core, compute intensive performance into a small form factor.'
property='og:title' content='MinnowBoard.org Foundation | MinnowBoard Turbot Official Site'
property='og:type' content='website'
property='og:url' content='https://minnowboard.org/'
property='og:image' content='https://minnowboard.org/theme/images/minnow-og.png'
